text:
Project.getBuildListeners() specifies that the returned list should not be
modified, yet AntClassLoader.buildFinished() removes itself from that list
thereby breaking that contract.

This is affecting my usage of a thirdparty tool (eclipse) which is iterating
over the buildListeners instead of calling Project.fireBuildFinished() as it
wasn't a public method for ant 1.4

Does AntClassLoader really need to remove itself?
creator: wr0ngway@yahoo.com

text:
Fixed on 1.5 branch.

AntClassLoader removes itself to improve its chances of being garbage collected
so it should still be done.

I have changed getBuildListeners to return a cloned list which makes it safe to
iterate over the list. It is the only safe thing to do and in fact it was clear
that Project should be getting a cloned list for its own iterations.
creator: conor@apache.org
